title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Changing your mind rarely happens overnight. It may be necessary to chew on new information several times over before it sinks in. If the material is very abstract or richly poetic, you could struggle in figuring out how to connect it to practical issues in your life. The truth is you might need to give your brain a rest by engaging in physical activities or working on a creative project. A brief change in venue will likely be enough for you to cycle back and allow the newfound wisdom to take deeper root within. Doubt is the key to knowledge. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
